Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 256th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2009...
Traded from Atlanta to Cleveland on 1/31/2012 (Going to ATL: SS M. Tejada. Going to CLE: 3B P. Valdejuli)...
Injured on 4/17/2014 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 1/31/2016 (Going to STL: 2B P. Valdejuli, P R. Veloz, P T. Stayton, CF N. Schierholz. Going to CLE: P A. Cashner, P P. Liriano)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/5/2016, off Juan Cruz (CHN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 8/16/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/12/2019, hitting .478 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 8/22/2020...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Seattle on 7/23/2022...
Hit 3 homeruns against Seattle, driving in 4 runs on 7/23/2022...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 8/30/2022...
